short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Instead of copy and pasting, get to understand stack overflow code solutions better with this extension

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension helps its users (like junior developers) better understand lines of code better, for instance a solution on stack overflow can be explained in simple terms to the user with relevant example for better understanding of its application, thereby improving the developer's knowledge.
